job_details.degree_required: Tertiary qualifications in Business or IT related discipline

jd:
Role: Pega Solutions Architect
Location: Woodland Hills, CA
Duration: 6+ Months

Job description:
Experience with Java/Python, CRM, Marketing software, Channel integration, Real Time Decisioning is desirable.
Experience in PEGA Development, PEGA Decisioning, any programming language (Python or Java).
Ability to lead decision strategy designs in Marketing.
Technical background with advanced business acumen across financial services.
Exposure to Marketing cross industry is desirable.
Ability to endure long term training and enablement.
People management and team/people development skills.
Competent technical skills: Understanding the current data architecture/design and infrastructure and articulating future state.
Significant experience in working within small to medium size teams to deliver best in class data, applications and technology infrastructure.
SQL coding, data modelling technique, semantic data layer, campaign management process.
Advanced business analysis skills, high level & detailed solution design and implementation.
Advanced interpersonal, communication, documentation and presentation skills.
Pega Decisioning & Marketing trained & certified consultants are desirable.
Pega System Architect trained & certified is desirable.
Knowledge across the Pega PRPC framework, either Case Management or Decisioning & Marketing is desirable.
Tertiary qualifications in Business or IT related discipline.
SDLC Professional experience.
Formal qualification or certification in data related discipline.
Post graduate qualification highly desirable.
Industry certifications highly desirable e.g. Teradata, Microsoft, IBM, Oracle.
Knowledge of Big Data platforms such as Hadoop is highly desirable.
